title: Drankful Hydration MTB Waist Pack puts 1.5L on your hips, plus Stealth Pack for Enduro
content:
Drankful are crowdfunding a new Hydration Hip Pack for mountain bikers, describing it as the ultimate lumbar adventure pack. A 1.5L hydration bladder with dedicated internal compartment and magnetic hose clip, an offset magnetic buckle, deployable hidden water bottle pockets and a weatherproof exterior… this MTB Hip Pack seems to have it all.
